actionable_tasks.title: Complete MongoDB TTL Indexes (Remaining 50%)
actionable_tasks.description: Finish implementing MongoDB TTL indexes which are currently at 50% completion. TTL indexes automatically expire documents after a specified time, ideal for logs, sessions, or temporary data in EchoTune AI.
implementation_steps: Identify collections needing TTL (e.g., chat sessions, temp recommendations)
Add TTL indexes via MongoDB shell or Mongoose schema: db.collection.createIndex({ "createdAt": 1 }, { expireAfterSeconds: 3600 })
Test expiration by inserting sample docs and verifying deletion after TTL
Update roadmap status to 100% and commit
